title: suggestied
author: suggestied
content: Hey, I'm known as "Suggestied" in this industry.   I'm a smart-contract developer, capable of making almost everything; from a simple token contract to an entire decentralized casino.I'm a web developer too, so making the site design and integrating the web3 is something i could do too.Can complete solidity & rust projects (solana & ethereum).Automating Web3 related tasks is something i could do too.Projects I've made:- An OlympusDAO fork, with more advanced features.- Play to earn NFT games- Decentralized CasinoApproximate prices:- OlympusDao fork. $1000.- Simple token. $100.- Advanced smart contract. $500.Price for smart contracts depends on complexity & the demand.Please let me know if this is something you're interested in, you can contact me on telegram. (t.me/suggestied)
